q: Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 White House race.`` I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified,'' he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either. 1. Google's core engineering and product leadership team-- many of whom remain at Google-- before Eric Schmidt arrived.`` He's an engineer,'' Craig Silverstein said, when asked Friday whether Page is shy. However, the CEO acknowledged that Google first needed to do some`` serious spadework,'' such as developing advanced LTE networks to carry massive and inevitable data loads. These will be 8-to-10- megabit networks, roughly 10 times what we have today, which will usher in new and creative applications, mostly entertainment and social, for these phone platforms, Eric Schmidt wrote in a recent Harvard Business Review article.
